author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
We sync goerli on a couple of nodes and deploy a deposit contract, then we fork our nodes (beacon and el) off the main network.
Thus goerli will keep going, while we are on our "shadow forked" chain on PoS.
We can then replay transactions from the real chain on our "private" chain
